p: On the other hand, Li et al. (2011) and Morsy (2017) reported that turmeric essential oil's chemical composition depends on geographic origin and part of the plant used. Li et al. (2011) stated that volatile oils from leaves and flowers of C. longa are dominated by monoterpenes, particularly p-cymene, β-phellandrene (β-felandrene), terpinolene (terpenoline), p-cymen-8-ol, cineole, and myrcene.
